author: Whitney Misja
review: We rented from here for 7 years. Julia was our property manager and we cannot say enough good things about her! She is kind, friendly, approachable and  quick to respond and take care of whatever needs to be taken care of. Highly recommend Optimusbonus if you get to work with Julia!

author: Hansen Curt
review: Bad place to rent from they never communicate or do nothing to fix anything. My rental was a dump had no ventilation whatsoever. Keisha is the worst person to work with she is very unprofessional she doesn't have any communication skills. I

author: Julie Roman
review: Julia went above and beyond today in walking us though a solution to a problem we were having with flooding in a unit.  She was very knowledgable and patient with us as she thoroughly explained the process.

author: Caryn Scheffer
review: Response time is considerably slow once you become a tenant.  Almost as if you are intentionally being ignored.  However, when washer and dryer didn't work to complete a single load, service was contacted immediately.  When the dryer was

author: Matt
review: Shady dealings and slum lords, fix 3 year old problems and have them stick worker with the bill and parts. Trailer parks are filled with used needle rigs and overflowing trash.

author: Edwin Sepos
review: Showed up on time, knew what the homeowner wanted and brought to our attention, pleasant to speak with. However we drove across the country to see a home that had a line of people already waiting, if I would have known that I would have

author: Scott Fallon
review: Be careful if you rent a property through Optimus. They charged us $315 of our security deposit for "general cleaning" despite that we left the property spotless. The lease allowed cleaning only if we left the property dirty and we provided

author: Ellen Yacknin
review: As B'ham property owners, we feel lucky to be able to work with and rely on Suzzanne at Optimus.  She is professional, easy to work with, extremely responsive to our concerns, always cheerful (even when she is having a bad day!), and always

author: Lauren Rogers
review: We've had our ups and down  (who hasn't with property management at a mobile home park?) but when it comes down to it, Julia has been an understanding and reasonable property manager, and not to mention, kind. She is always calm and clear

author: Terry Fine
review: We have rented with Optimus for a couple of years now.  I have been in PropertyManagement for 25 plus years, so I can say with certainty that this company is very professional in every thing they have done for us.  I've read all these

author: just me
review: I've been renting with Drayton harbor realty for about 10 years till Monte past away and Optimus took over. I'll say as soon as that happened my rent went up $200 and I'll say Julia was the worst person you can ever communicate with. We

author: Velvet Humphres
review: This is the best company I have ever rented from in whatcom county. The receptionist is so kind and very helpful. The person who works on finances/book keeping is a gem. The lease was very straight forward and not in anyway overbearing to

author: Ava Sakowski
review: These folks are an excellent property management company. They are extremely responsive. However I know that has a lot to do with the landlord who is also very responsive to property needs.

author: Maddy
review: Lisa has been so helpful with me in answering all my questions, she is kind, understanding and very quick to respond. I have never dealt with a property management company like this before. Give Lisa a raise!!!

author: Pierre Constantin
review: Julia and her entire staff are very professional, prompt to respond and smart in their managerial decisions.  I highly recommend Optimus Property Solutions

author: Jeremiah Keenan
review: Julia and the staff are honest and easy to deal with. You can only do good business with good people and they are great.

author: James Morland
review: This property management company is one of the worst ones Ive ever had to deal with. They dont listen to their clients, they dont even care to be on the property and they dont fulfill maintenance orders.

author: Amanda Hasbrouck
review: So far ok. They just took over managing our apt complex so still transitioning.

author: Pat James
review:
My opinion with my experience with Suzanne was that she was unprofessional,  arrogant,
condescending,  and rude.

author: Greg Spencer
review: Super friendly staff, took plenty of time showing me the unit and answering my questions.

author: Alexis Tejeda
review: Great member service very helpful i went ask for questions and i got all the answers to it

author: Smiley Face
review: Rich company, poor values.

author: Tom Rea
review: Always very courteous staff to assist with any ?

author: Aleksander Greenleaf (Alek)
review: Very friendly. Super direct about expectations.

author: Jodie James
review: Thank you Suzzane for everything!
